Name: Super Yodelland: Legend of the Katzenbär
About the game: SUPER YODELLAND: Legend of the Katzenbär , is a nice 2D-Jump-'n'-Run video game for everyone of all ages. Focused on exploring an alpine world full of mysteries. THE STORY Bert’s failed school project about rocket science caused heavy environmental pollution all over the forest. Intent to clean up on his own, Bert set out to the forest. Unfortunately there was a mysterious spirit creature spotted, locally known as the legendary “Katzenbär”. RUN No matter if uphill or downhill, you never run out of breath. JUMP Jumping is crucial to make way in the rough terrain of Yodelland. Bert can even “DOUBLEJUMP” by pressing the “JUMP-Button” twice, right from the start. PARAGLIDE After performing the “DOUBLEJUMP” and pressing the “JUMP-Button” a third time in the air, Bert activates his ultra portable PARAGLIDER to glide smoothly to the ground. Yodel Yodeling is the primary way to interact with citizens of Yodelland and you probably break some stones with it. violence-free gameplay no boring text boxes classic platformer gameplay with a sense of adventure easy to access controls an unique art style
